message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $800000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $900000. This is a fair price, considering the product's value to you is $800000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'd like to get as close to my target price as possible.

I understand you're close to your target price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, so I'm counteroffering at $950000. This is a fair price, considering the product's value to me is $1200000.
